Patch Set 3: Code-Review-1

How about v1 api? I think it is reasonable to fix it in v1.
please be aware of duplicate here: https://review.openstack.org/#/c/261441/

Patch Set 3: Code-Review-1

Sorry for my patch, I abandoned mine. And As Kairat said , v1 should be fixed as well.

Patch Set 3:

BackendExecption could be raised by not only location-add but also image-update. So I think you can update the patch and fix them together. Please see my patch to get more information.

(1 comment)

Patch Set 4:

(1 comment)

Patch Set 4:

I saw that many BackendException were raised by s3, sheepdog and swift backend. And the error message in each BackendException has described clearly. I think it's enough for users to know what error happend.

On the other hand, since we should do many changes if add subclasses of BackendException to glance_store, it needs a bp at least IMO.

Patch Set 4:

Agree with wangxiyuan,

we need a blueprint if decided to add subclasses for different types of backend exceptions to return appropriate error code.

Patch Set 4: Verified-1

Merge Failed.

This change or one of its cross-repo dependencies was unable to be automatically merged with the current state of its repository. Please rebase the change and upload a new patchset.

Patch Set 4: Code-Review-1

This patch has been -1ed because it has not been updated in
>=2months. The patch also has either a -1/-2 from a core reviewer or a
-1 from Jenkins.

Please, update/rebase the patch if the lack of updates was actually a
lack of reviews or if you think the patch is still relevant.

**NOTE: This will be abandoned if no update is done in 1 week.**

If this action does not seem accurate, please, ping flaper87 on IRC
and he will gladly revert it. Sorry for the inconvenience and we look
forward to have more contributions from you.

Patch Set 4:

Hi All,

Any suggestions on this?

Patch Set 4:

agree with Ian and keep my previous opinion: need a BP in glance store to enhance the error execption.

Patch Set 4: Code-Review-1

Can we either

1) restore the patch that does not merge conflict?

2) think about this change for ocata and abandon it until then?

3) follow process like lite-spec if the discussion is stalled?

Patch Set 4: Workflow-1

Thank you Nikhil,

I think we can revisit it in Ocata, I will work on lite-specs for this.

Abandoned

as per confirmation, let's abandon now and think of restoring in ocata
